#include<iostream>
#include<math.h>
#include<cstdio>
#include<cstdlib>
#include<algorithm>
#include<string>
#include<vector>
#include<map>
#include<cstring>
#define M 1000000007
#define ll long long int

using namespace std;

ll ch[10002]={0};int uv[10002]={0};int pr[10002]={0};
int main () {
ll n,m,i,u,v;
cin>>n>>m;
for(i=1;i<=m;i++){
    cin>>u>>v;
    uv[u]++;uv[v]++;
    pr[u]++;
    ch[v]++;
}
if(n==1 && m==0) cout<<"YES"<<endl;
else{
if(n==m+1){
        int flag=0;int cnt=0;
    for(i=1;i<=n;i++){
        if(ch[i]==1){
            cnt++;
    }
    if(!uv[i]) flag=1;
    }
    if(cnt==n-1 && !flag) {
            int cnt1=0;int cnt2=0;
           for(i=1;i<=n;i++) {
                if(uv[i]==1) cnt1++;
                if(pr[i] && uv[i]>1) cnt2++;
           }
           if(cnt1+cnt2==n) cout<<"YES"<<endl;
           else cout<<"NO"<<endl;
    }
    else cout<<"NO"<<endl;
}
else cout<<"NO"<<endl;
}
return 0;
}
